title: cygan
author: cygan
content: today i accidentally came across this tweet from the developer kouloumos, which is divided into a total of 13 tweets and i do not want to list/post them here.he describes the testing guide for the new version and asks all interested to explore the latest changes and contribute to Bitcoin running smoothly and bug free!https://bitcoincore.reviews/v24-rc-testinghttps://github.com/bitcoin-core/bitcoin-devwiki/wiki/24.0-Release-Candidate-Testing-Guide

comments.author: DaveF
comments.body: Obvious, but never said enough. Don't run RC code on production machines with real money involved and even if it's only a little sitting there, backup your wallet.dat file before doing running it.I know we all know, but lets be sure everyone knows.-Dave
